KitKat::

She pulled back for moment, "Uh, Blackfang? Are you sure? I mean, 
sure your a wolf and I'm a wolf, but, well, Your not a pred and I am."

She turned and faced the wall. "No, this just can't be. As much as I 
want to do this, I can't explain.  It's just that, well, how will the 
empire react when they find out a maximal and a predacon....it's 
just....not...."  She felt herself start to tense up as her emotion 
chip started to go into hyper active. "I gotta go."  She transformed 
into wolf mode and bolted from the room. She ran out into the hallway 
and went to find her way outside.
